(JP3884, I hate to say this...and everyone else defending the Pred base 
heroically, but the Newcomers haven't even left their base yet.  They aren't 
at the Pred base, and Sixshot is not at the Pred base, he's about 5 miles 
away from the Ark after strafing it)
